column1: Smoque BBQ////My neighbors bought smoque for their daughters birthday and invited me to the party. I was amazed at how fun the food was. It had all the sauces on the side and they had pulled pork
column3: and brisket. It was served in catering style foil containers and there was so much of it. When he told me what he paid
column4: I became ecstatic about using Smoque for my next party. I'm addicted and can't wait to try again!
